title: Jay Chou 周杰倫 (稻香 Rice Field) (With English Subtitles)

json.text: If you have too many complaints towards this world
When you fall down, you don't dare to continue to move forward
Why must people be so weak and depraved?
Please switch on the TV and watch
How many people are bravely working hard to live on in this world
Shouldn't we be content with what we have?
Cherish everything even if you don't have material possessions
I still remember you said that home is the only castle
Follow the scent of the rice fields, river stream and continue running
Smile I know your childhood dream
Don't cry Let the fireflies help you escape
Folk songs You must rely on them
Return home, return to your happiness from the very beginning
Don't give up so easily
Just like what I said
The dream that couldn't be achieved, just change it to another dream
Colour your life
First colour the love in your life a colour you like
Come on smile Success and being famous is never the objective
Letting yourself be happy is more meaningful
The paper plane from childhood is finally now back in my hands
That so called happiness
Running barefoot in the fields chasing dragonflies and getting tired
Stealing fruits Getting stung by the bees until we are scared
Who is sniggering?
I leaned against the scarecrow, feeling the wind, singing a song, fell asleep
Oh oh, in the afternoon the sound of the guitar is clear among the buzzing of bugs
Oh oh, if the sunshine spills on the road then I won't be afraid of being heart broken
Cherish everything even if you don't have material possessions
I still remember you said that home is the only castle
Follow the scent of the rice fields, river stream and continue running
Smile I know your childhood dream
Don't cry Let the fireflies help you escape
Folk songs You must rely on them
Return home, return to your happiness from the very beginning
I still remember you said that home is the only castle
Follow the scent of the rice fields, river stream and continue running
Smile I know your childhood dream
Don't cry Let the fireflies help you escape
Folk songs You must rely on them
Return home, return to your happiness from the very beginning
